Name: Crazy World VR
About the game: Come & wander around this beautifully landscaped theme park where Nexon's characters such as Dao and Bazzi appear. Interact with total strangers and make new friends online. Crazy World VR offers various mini-games you can play with others online, together with social & customization features. - Let's decorate ourselves in the VR World! In Crazy World VR, you can decorate your characters with various items. You can also decorate your own house and visit other friends' houses! - Let's enjoy various games with friends from all over the world! Crazy World VR offers you to enjoy games with friends from all over the world. Collect Lucci by playing archery, bowling, shooting, tennis, etc.! Of course, you can join your friends and play together, and the mini-games are easy to play and are appropriate for all ages.
